title: Carrollton/ Farmers Branch | 2nd Chance | Bad Credit | Broken Lease
posting_body: Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability

Community Amenities: Assigned parking, Fitness center, Private detached garages($100/mo), Club house, Bus stop, School bus stop, Play ground, Door to door trash pickup, Business center, Perimeter fence, Dry cleaning service, Picnic area, 2 Pools, Laundry room, Gated entrance, Free WiFi Areas, Volleyball, Hot Tub, Racquetball, Outdoor Grills, Sauna, Dog Park, Tennis court, Carports

Unit Amenities: Private patios/balconies, W/D connections, Ceiling fans, Crown molding, Intrusion alarms, Microwaves, Premium Appliances, Garden/large tubs, Fire places, Hi-speed internet, Self cleaning ovens, Storage closet outside, Ice makers, Walk-in closets, Frost free refrigerators, Premium Countertops, Miniblinds, Dishwashers, Attached garages, Garbage disposals, Cable ready
Some issues we may be able to hep with: felony - misdemeanor - eviction - bad credit - broken lease - closed bankruptcy - low credit
Must make 2.5-3 times the rent in income
We have 100's of communities to choose from.
We can send a listing based on your certain criteria.
We specialize in luxury apartment leasing.
